#yStrength and #b

theshadowreaper:ReapPower.NAME: Reap
DESCRIPTIONS: When you end your turn with unused [E] enemies with #yReap take #b
damage.

theshadowreaper:DemonArmorPower.NAME: Demon Armor
DESCRIPTIONS: When you end your turn with unused [E] gain #b
#yBlock for each unspent [E] .

theshadowreaper:MasterZedsTrainingPower.NAME: Master Zeds Training
DESCRIPTIONS: When you end your turn with unused [E] draw #b
cards for each unspent [E] .

theshadowreaper:DarkinRagePower.NAME: Darkin Rage
DESCRIPTIONS: When you play a card that costs #b2 or more [E] gain #b
Strength.

theshadowreaper:HeavyHitterPower.NAME: Heavy Hitter
DESCRIPTIONS: The First time you play a card that costs #b2 or more each turn [E] gain #b
Energy.

theshadowreaper:GoldAdvantagePower.NAME: Gold Advantage
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a card that costs less than it's original cost gain #b
Block.

theshadowreaper:BloodragePower.NAME: Bloodrage
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you lose HP from a card draw #b
card.

theshadowreaper:AssassinsTrainingPower.NAME: Assassin's Training
DESCRIPTIONS: If you have unspent [E] at the end of your turn, Next turn, gain Strength equal to your remaining [E] .

theshadowreaper:SiphoningStrikesPower.NAME: Siphoning Strikes
DESCRIPTIONS: When you apply #yReap to an enemy, Gain #b
Block.

theshadowreaper:PerfectFormPower.NAME: Perfect Form
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play 3 Attacks, Gain #b1 Dexterity. Whenever you play 4 Skills, Gain #b1 Strength.

theshadowreaper:AllOrNothingPower.NAME: All Or Nothing
DESCRIPTIONS: Strength no longer persists through turns.

theshadowreaper:WhispersOfBloodPower.NAME: Whispers Of Blood
